scripts.seed: wrangler d1 execute market_command --local --file=./migrations/0001_init.sql && wrangler d1 execute market_command --local --command="DELETE FROM symbols; DELETE FROM daily_bars; DELETE FROM dashboard_configs; DELETE FROM dashboard_sections; DELETE FROM dashboard_groups; DELETE FROM dashboard_items; DELETE FROM dashboard_columns; DELETE FROM universes; DELETE FROM universe_symbols; DELETE FROM snapshots_meta; DELETE FROM snapshot_rows; DELETE FROM breadth_snapshots;" && wrangler d1 execute market_command --local --file=./migrations/0002_seed.sql
